articles.title: Quasi-experimental evaluation of a nationwide diabetes prevention programme - Nature.com
articles.description: Analysis of the largest behaviour change programme for prediabetes globally provides causal evidence that lifestyle advice and counselling implemented at scale can improve key cardiovascular risk factors.
